Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of Energy, National Nuclear Security Administration
Additional Scope Comments: The National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) is a semi-autonomous agency under the US Department of Energy and will submit a separate NA-1005 with the NNSA Administrator identified in Category 1.  NNSA will use Schedule Items 010 and 011 but will not use Item 012.  NNSA does not have enough positions that would fall under Item 012 to warrant use of the three year retention.
Legacy Email Scope: Email capture will be "point-forward" upon approval of this NA-1005 by NARA.  Estimated implementation date 01/01/2017.  The legacy process for email was print-to-file and will be in place until full Capstone implementation.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: An organization chart depicting the NNSA organization and management structure is not available on-line.  A file is attached to this form which defines the organization and management structure as well as the position functions identified as Capstone Officials.
Category 2 Position Title/Role and Numbe: Principal Deputy Administrator, 1;  Deputy Administrators (2 positions), 2; Associate Administrators (8 positions), 8
Category 3 Position Title/Role and Numbe: Principal Assistant Deputy Administrators (3 positions), 3;    Principal Deputy Associate Administrator, 1;   Assistant Deputy Administrators (11 positions), 11;  Deputy Associate Administrators (9 positions), 9; Directors (30 positions), 30
Category 4 Position Title/Role and Numbe: Not applicable, no positions is this category exist., 0
Category 5 Position Title/Role and Numbe: NA-These positions are captured as Associate Administrators-Category 2., 0
Category 8 Position Title/Role and Numbe: Chief of Staff/Associate Principal Deputy Administrator, 1;  Chief Scientist, 1; General Counsel, 1
Category 9 Position Title/Role and Numbe: NAâ€“NNSA has 3 PAS already identified in Category 1 and 2., 0
Category 10 Position Title/Role and Numb: Deputy Field Office Managers (8 positions), 8; Deputy General Counsel (2 positions), 2
Senior Agency Official: NNSA CIO Wayne Jones approved after notifying SAO Michael Johnson

Additional Scope Comments: Permanent Records will be cutoff at the end of the employees tenure.  Email will be transferred to NARA 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: Prior to Capstone, CMS has a print-and-file policy for email.  CMS is currently researching the level of legacy email that exists, and will include it in Capstone implementation. As an example, CMS has email of the Administrator back to approximately 2009.
